courses.customDesc: One course from each of the following GE areas must be completed: A1, A2, A3, B1, B2, B3, (B4 [lab] must be completed with either B2 or B3), B1-B5 elective, C1, C2, C3, C4, D1, D4, D5, and F. C4, D5, and F should be taken only after Junior standing is reached (90 units). One (1) course must be completed from B1, in addition to STAT 217. No SOC class may be taken to fulfill GE D5. Refer to online catalog for GE course selection and Graduation Writing Requirement (GWR).

Any Sociology Elective (300-400 level) can go here. Refer to catalog for course selections.

Students can attempt to fulfill the requirement after 90 earned units; students should complete the requirement before senior year. Any GWR class or GWR exam can go here. Refer to current catalog for prerequisites.

Select one of the following: BUS207, BUS409, BUS410, BUS473; CRP/NR 404; ES380; JOUR302; LS214; PHIL334; POLS295, POLS340, POLS342, POLS384, POLS386 or POLS387, POLS417, POLS426, POLS445, POLS457; PSY375; SOC402, SOC406, SOC412.

A total of 4 units of either POLS386 or POLS387 may count toward concentration requirements. Consultation with a faculty advisor is recommended.
Any Sociology Elective (300-400 level) can go here. Refer to catalog for course selections.
